member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Title
member.summary: The title of the event, for example March 2019 Meetup. Must be unique for the group.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Description
member.summary: A description of the event, in markdown format.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.Location
member.summary: The location of the event, for example York Minster, Room 201 York St John University

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.StartTime
member.summary: Date and time the event starts

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Event.EndTime
member.summary: Date and time the event ends. Must be after the StartTime

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.Models.Group.Name
member.summary: The unique name for the group / community. For example York Code Dojo

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewEvent.Title
member.summary: The title of the event, for example March 2019 Meetup. Must be unique for the group.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewEvent.Description
member.summary: A description of the event, in markdown format.

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewEvent.Location
member.summary: The location of the event, for example York Minster, Room 201 York St John University

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewEvent.StartTime
member.summary: Date and time the event starts

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewEvent.EndTime
member.summary: Date and time the event ends. Must be after the StartTime

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.CreateNewGroup.Name
member.summary: The unique name for the group / community. For example York Code Dojo

member.name: P:VenimusAPIs.ViewModels.GetGroup.Name
member.summary: The unique name of the group / community. For example York Code Dojo
